mapper.sql: ass.id as id, ass.assembly_number as contractN, ass.status as status, ass.factory_id as factoryId, factory.factory_name as factoryName, factory.contact_first_name as contactFirstName, factory.contact_last_name as contactLastName, factory.contact_full_name as contactFullName, factory.contact_phone as contactPhone, factory.contact_phone_country_code as contactPhoneCountryCode, factory.contact_email as contactEmail, ass.total_qty as qty, ass.created_time as createdTime, ass.consignee_id as consigneeId, profile.first_name as consigneeFirstName, profile.last_name as consigneeLastName, profile.full_name as consigneeFullName, profile.tel_number as consigneePhone, profile.country_code as consigneePhoneCountryCode, profile.email as consigneeEmail, ass.processing_fee as processCost, ass.processing_fee_ratio as processCostRatio

ass.id as id, ass.assembly_number as contractN, ass.status as status, ass.factory_id as factoryId, factory.factory_name as factoryName, factory.contact_first_name as contactFirstName, factory.contact_last_name as contactLastName, factory.contact_full_name as contactFullName, factory.contact_phone as contactPhone, factory.contact_phone_country_code as contactPhoneCountryCode, factory.contact_email as contactEmail, ass.total_qty as qty, ass.created_time as createdTime, ass.consignee_id as consigneeId, profile.first_name as consigneeFirstName, profile.last_name as consigneeLastName, profile.full_name as consigneeFullName, profile.tel_number as consigneePhone, profile.country_code as consigneePhoneCountryCode, profile.email as consigneeEmail, ass.total_price as totalPrice, ass.payment_type as paymentType, ass.product_price as productPrice, ass.processing_fee as processCost, ass.processing_fee_ratio as processCostRatio

payment.id as id, payment.payment_status as status, payment.ope_assembly_order_id as bizId, payment.amount as amount, payment.amount_proportion as paymentRatio, payment.invoice_num as invoiceNum, payment.invoice_picture as invoicePicture, payment.payment_day as dayNum, payment.payment_time as actualPaymentDate, payment.description as remark, payment.payment_type as paymentType, payment.planned_payment_time as estimatedPaymentDate
mapper.select: select count(st.sta) as totalCount, st.sta as status from (select case when status = '6' then '2' when status = '7' then '2' else '1' end as sta from ope_assembly_order) st group by status

select count(*) from ope_assembly_order ass left join ope_factory factory on factory.id = ass.factory_id and factory.dr = 0 left join ope_sys_user_profile profile on profile.sys_user_id = ass.consignee_id and profile.dr = 0

select
from ope_assembly_order_payment payment where payment.dr = 0
and payment.ope_assembly_order_id in
#{item}

select
from ope_assembly_order ass left join ope_factory factory on factory.id = ass.factory_id and factory.dr = 0 left join ope_sys_user_profile profile on profile.sys_user_id = ass.consignee_id and profile.dr = 0 where ass.dr=0 and ass.id=#{id}

select trace.id as id, trace.status as status, trace.event as event, trace.event_time as eventTime, trace.created_by as createdBy, profile.first_name as createdByFirstName, profile.last_name as createdByLastName, profile.full_name as createdByFullName, trace.memo as memo from ope_assembiy_order_trace trace left join ope_sys_user_profile profile on trace.created_by = profile.sys_user_id and profile.dr = 0 where trace.dr = 0 and trace.ope_assembiy_order_id =#{id} order by trace.created_time asc

select payment.id as id, payment.payment_status as status, payment.ope_assembly_order_id as bizId, payment.amount as amount, payment.amount_proportion as paymentRatio, payment.invoice_num as invoiceNum, payment.invoice_picture as invoicePicture, payment.payment_day as dayNum, payment.payment_time as actualPaymentDate, payment.description as remark, payment.payment_type as paymentType, payment.planned_payment_time as estimatedPaymentDate from ope_assembly_order_payment payment where payment.dr = 0 and payment.ope_assembly_order_id =#{id}

select assOrder.id as id, assOrder.product_number as productN, assOrder.en_name as enName, assOrder.assembly_qty as qty, assOrder.price as price, assOrder.assembly_qty * assOrder.price as subtotal from ope_assembly_b_order assOrder where assOrder.dr = 0 and assOrder.assembly_id =#{id}

select trace.id as id, trace.status as status, trace.event as event, trace.event_time as eventTime, trace.created_by as createdBy, profile.first_name as createdByFirstName, profile.last_name as createdByLastName, profile.full_name as createdByFullName from ope_assembiy_order_trace trace left join ope_sys_user_profile profile on trace.created_by = profile.sys_user_id and profile.dr = 0 where trace.dr = 0 and trace.ope_assembiy_order_id =#{id} order by trace.created_time asc

select border.id as id, border.product_id as productId, border.product_number as productN, product.en_name as enName, border.assembly_qty as assemblyTotal, border.complete_qty as assemblyCompleteTotal, if(border.complete_qty = 0, 0, 1) as assemblyFlag from ope_assembly_b_order border inner join ope_parts_product product on border.product_id = product.id where border.assembly_id = #{id}

select count(assem.id) as assemblyCompleteTotal, DATE_FORMAT(assem.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as assemblyDate from ope_product_assembly assem left join ope_assembly_b_order border on assem.assembly_b_id = border.id group by assemblyDate

select count(*) from ope_assembly_b_qc assBqc left join ope_assembly_b_order oabo on assBqc.assembly_b_id = oabo.id and oabo.dr = 0 left join ope_assembly_order oao on oabo.assembly_id = oao.id and oao.dr = 0 left join ope_parts_product product on product.id = oabo.product_id and product.dr = 0

select assBqc.id as id, oabo.product_number as productN, oabo.en_name as enName, assBqc.total_quality_inspected as qcTotal, assBqc.pass_count as passTotal from ope_assembly_b_qc assBqc left join ope_assembly_b_order oabo on assBqc.assembly_b_id = oabo.id and oabo.dr = 0 left join ope_assembly_order oao on oabo.assembly_id = oao.id and oao.dr = 0 left join ope_parts_product product on product.id = oabo.product_id and product.dr = 0
select item.id as id, item.serial_num as serialN, item.qc_result as qcResult from ope_assembly_qc_item item where item.id = #{id} and item.dr = 0

select item.id as id, item.qc_result as status, item.created_by as operatorId, profile.first_name as operatorFirstName, profile.last_name as operatorLastName, item.created_time as qcDate, item.qc_result as status from ope_assembly_qc_item item inner join ope_sys_user_profile profile on item.created_by = profile.sys_user_id where item.serial_num = #{serialN}

select trace.id as id, trace.product_qc_template_id as itemId, trace.product_qc_template_name as itemName, trace.product_qc_template_b_id as qcResultId, trace.product_qc_template_b_name as qcResultName, trace.picture as partQcPicture from ope_assembly_qc_trace trace where trace.dr = 0 and trace.assembly_qc_item_id =#{id}
